alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 10:04PM CDT until April 02 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wet Snow Accumulations Overnight... Snow will develop after midnight, possibly initially mixed with rain. A band of 2 to 5 inches is expected overnight into Saturday morning before exiting by late morning. Snowfall rates could reach up to 1 inch per hour early Saturday morning leading to slushy or snow-covered roads. Improving conditions are expected by later Saturday morning as snow diminishes and temperatures begin to warm. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Grant County. In Iowa, Clayton and Fayette Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
